verses.verse: Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6378>vial<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H3332>poured<s%> it upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>, and said, Is it not that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H4886>anointed<s%> thee to be <S%H5057>prince<s%> over his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>?

When thou art <S%H3212>departed<s%> from <S%H5978>me<s%> <S%H3117>to-day<s%>, then thou shalt <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> by <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>'s <S%H6900>sepulchre<s%>, in the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> at <S%H6766>Zelzah<s%>; and they will <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H860>thee<s%>, The asses which thou <S%H1980>wentest<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> are <S%H4672>found<s%>; <S%H1>and<s%>, lo, thy father hath <S%H5203>left<s%> off <S%H1697>caring<s%> for the <S%H860>asses<s%>, and is <S%H1672>anxious<s%> for <S%H559>you<s%>, saying, What shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> for my <S%H1121>son<s%>?

Then shalt thou go <S%H2498>on<s%> <S%H1973>forward<s%> from <S%H935>thence<s%>, and thou shalt come to the <S%H436>oak<s%> of <S%H8396>Tabor<s%>; and there shall <S%H4672>meet<s%> thee there <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> going <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1423>kids<s%>, and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3603>loaves<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> a <S%H5035>bottle<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%>:
and they <S%H7592>will<s%> <S%H7965>salute<s%> <S%H5414>thee<s%>, and give thee <S%H8147>two<s%> loaves of <S%H3899>bread<s%>, which thou shalt <S%H3947>receive<s%> of their <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

After <S%H310><s%> that thou shalt <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, where is the <S%H5333>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>: and it shall come to <S%H935>pass<s%>, when thou art come thither to the <S%H5892>city<s%>, that thou shalt <S%H6293>meet<s%> a <S%H2256>band<s%> of <S%H5030>prophets<s%> coming <S%H3381>down<s%> from the high <S%H1116>place<s%> with a <S%H5035>psaltery<s%>, and a <S%H8596>timbrel<s%>, and a <S%H2485>pipe<s%>, and a <S%H3658>harp<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5012>them<s%>; and they will be prophesying:

and the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H6743>come<s%> mightily upon <S%H5012>thee<s%>, and thou shalt prophesy with <S%H2015>them<s%>, and shalt be turned into <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>.
And let it <S%H226>be<s%>, when these signs are <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H6213>thee<s%>, that thou do as <S%H4672>occasion<s%> shall <S%H3027>serve<s%> <S%H430>thee<s%>; for God is with thee.

And thou shalt go <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me to <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>; <S%H3381>and<s%>, behold, I will come down unto <S%H5927>thee<s%>, to offer <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%>, and to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H2076>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H5930>peace-offerings<s%>: <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shalt thou <S%H3176>tarry<s%>, till I <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H3045>thee<s%>, and show thee what thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%>.

And it was <S%H6437>so<s%>, that, when he had turned his <S%H7926>back<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> from <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2015>gave<s%> him <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>: and all those <S%H226>signs<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to pass that <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And when they <S%H935>came<s%> thither to the <S%H1389>hill<s%>, <S%H2256>behold<s%>, a band of <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H7125>met<s%> <S%H7307>him<s%>; and the Spirit of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6743>came<s%> mightily upon <S%H5012>him<s%>, and he prophesied among <S%H8432>them<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3045>pass<s%>, when all that knew him <S%H865>beforetime<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H5012>that<s%>, behold, he prophesied with the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, then the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H7453>another<s%>, What is this that is come unto the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%>? Is <S%H7586>Saul<s%> also among the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>?

And <S%H376>one<s%> of the same place <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, And who is their <S%H1>father<s%>? Therefore it became a <S%H4912>proverb<s%>, Is <S%H7586>Saul<s%> also among the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>?
And when he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H5012>prophesying<s%>, he <S%H935>came<s%> to the high <S%H1116>place<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H1730>uncle<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him and to his <S%H5288>servant<s%>, <S%H575>Whither<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H559>ye<s%>? And he said, To <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H860>asses<s%>; and when we <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they were not <S%H369>found<s%>, we <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>.
And <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H1730>uncle<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5046>Tell<s%> <S%H8050>me<s%>, I pray thee, what Samuel said unto <S%H559>you<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1730>uncle<s%>, He <S%H5046>told<s%> us <S%H5046>plainly<s%> that the <S%H860>asses<s%> were <S%H4672>found<s%>. But concerning the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%>, whereof <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%>, he told him <S%H5046>not<s%>.
And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H6817>called<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> together unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%>;

and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, I brought <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and I <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>, and out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> that oppressed <S%H3905>you<s%>:

but ye have this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3988>rejected<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, who himself <S%H3467>saveth<s%> you out of all your <S%H7451>calamities<s%> and your <S%H6869>distresses<s%>; and ye have <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7760>him<s%>, Nay, but set a <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3320>us<s%>. Now therefore present yourselves <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> by your <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, and by your <S%H505>thousands<s%>.
So <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> brought all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%>, and the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> was <S%H3920>taken<s%>.

And he brought the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> by their <S%H4940>families<s%>; and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4309>Matrites<s%> was <S%H3920>taken<s%>; and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%> was <S%H3920>taken<s%>: but when they <S%H1245>sought<s%> <S%H4672>him<s%>, he could not be found.

Therefore they <S%H7592>asked<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H376>further<s%>, Is there yet a man to <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H1988>hither<s%>? And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%>, <S%H2244>Behold<s%>, he hath hid himself among the <S%H3627>baggage<s%>.

And they <S%H7323>ran<s%> and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> him <S%H3320>thence<s%>; and when he stood <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, he was <S%H1361>higher<s%> than any of the <S%H5971>people<s%> from his <S%H7926>shoulders<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>.

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H7200>See<s%> ye him whom <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen<s%>, that there is none like him along all the <S%H5971>people<s%>? And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Long <S%H2421>live<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>.

Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H1696>told<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H4941>manner<s%> of the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%>, and <S%H3789>wrote<s%> it in a <S%H5612>book<s%>, and laid it <S%H3240>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>away<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> also <S%H1980>went<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>; and there <S%H3212>went<s%> with him the <S%H2428>host<s%>, whose <S%H3820>hearts<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5060>touched<s%>.

But certain <S%H1100>worthless<s%> <S%H1121>fellows<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, How shall this man <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H959>us<s%>? And they despised <S%H935>him<s%>, and brought him no <S%H4503>present<s%>. But he held his <S%H2790>peace<s%>.
